name: @deskpro-apps/jira-data-centre
title: Jira Data Centre
description: Integrate with self managed version of Jira to view issues linked with Deskpro tickets to streamline communication with users

instance_url.title: Jira Data Center Instance URL
instance_url.description: Enter the URL of your Jira Data Centre instance, e.g. https://my-jira-instance.com

api_key.title: Access Token
api_key.description: JIRA Data Centre user's access token, please follow the app setup guide to get this

default_comment_on_ticket_reply.title: Ticket reply as Jira comment?
default_comment_on_ticket_reply.description: When a Jira issue is linked to a Deskpro ticket, would you like to automatically add Deskpro replies as Jira comments?

default_comment_on_ticket_note.title: Ticket note as Jira comment?
default_comment_on_ticket_note.description: When a Jira issue is linked to a Deskpro ticket, would you like to automatically add Deskpro notes as Jira comments?

ticket_subject_as_issue_summary.title: Use ticket ID and subject as summary
ticket_subject_as_issue_summary.description: Pre-fill the Jira summary field with the ticket ID and subject when creating new Jira issues from Deskpro
